title: Grill House Worker Found Dead in Suspected Cunupia Robbery
summary: Ambrose Borde, a 54-year-old worker, was tragically found dead in his company vehicle following a suspected robbery in Cunupia. This somber event highlights the reality of sin and violence in a fallen world, a consequence acknowledged in Scripture (Romans 5:12 KJV). It underscores the fragility of life and the consequences of actions contrary to God's law, reminding us of the need for salvation offered through Jesus Christ and the ultimate justice that comes from God alone.
